To pneuma ksopyrén, or Sparkes of the spirit, being, motives to sacred theorems, and divine meditations. / By a reverend father of the Church of England. Davies, Athanasius, b. 1620 or 21.
[24], 144, 125-339, [1] p.
Printed for Edw. Thomas at the Adam and Eve in little Brittain without aldersgate, London, : 1658.
Dedication signed Athanasius Davies. Text is continuous despite pagination. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Nouember". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
